comment: The vertex degree of a one-edge graph, case 4: an edge from a vertex to itself contributes two to the vertex's degree. I. e. in a graph (simple pseudograph) with one edge which is a loop, the vertex connected with itself by the loop has degree 2. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 21-Feb-2021.)
